name: Death Mask (Gloom)
overview: The 2014 remake (by Czeslaw Mnich and Amigafans in the Gloom Engine) of the one of the original Doom style games that was made for the Amiga by Apache Software in 1995. This first person shooter was something like a first-person version of Into the Eagle's Nest. This version chose to do away with the split screen and focus on the core of the game. Co-operative multi-player is available.
